backend/main.mo: Primary canister logic defining user, job, application, credit, and unlocking types with initial state maps and authorization mixin.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old user profile structures into the new expanded profile format during canister upgrades.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing frontend components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/docs/missing-canister-functions: Documentation explaining frontend diagnostics for detecting missing backend canister methods and how to reproduce issues.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind-based global stylesheet defining color variables, themes, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML entry point mounting the SPA and loading the main TypeScript bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s router, protected routes, theme provider, and root layout using TanStack Router.
frontend/src/auth/manualAuthTypes.ts: Defines TypeScript types for user roles, auth session, and login credentials.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminCredi: Admin UI for viewing and updating the credit cost per candidate unlock.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminEmplo: Shows a table of employers and allows admins to add or deduct credits via dialogs.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminJobse: Displays a list of all jobseekers with basic status info.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminMetri: Presents dashboard metrics for employers, jobseekers, and credits used.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminUnloc: Displays employer unlock activity logs with timestamps and credit usage.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, links, and styling.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Implements the site header with navigation, user menu, and role‑based links.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Wraps pages with header, footer, and role-based layout container.
frontend/src/components/applications/Can: Empty placeholder component for candidate application form.
frontend/src/components/auth/InternetIde: Empty placeholder component for an Internet Identity help dialog.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginPage.t: A login page component handling email/password auth for three user roles and redirecting after login.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProtectedRo: Wraps pages with role-based access control, redirecting unauthorized users to the login page.
frontend/src/components/auth/RoleSetupMo: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/employer/Candida: Displays candidate info with locked/unlocked states and triggers an unlock confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/employer/UnlockC: A dialog showing credit cost and balance before confirming profile unlock, with validation and loading states.
frontend/src/components/jobs/EmployerJob: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/jobs/JobCard.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refetching dependent queries on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminQueries.ts: Provides admin-oriented queries and mutations for employers, jobseekers, unlock logs, and credit management.
frontend/src/hooks/useEmployerCredits.ts: Hooks to fetch employer credit balance and the credit cost per unlock.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity login, managing identity state, statuses, and AuthClient handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useManualAuth.tsx: Provides a context-based manual auth system with session storage, login/logout, and role handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and saving user profiles and retrieving the candidate directory via actor methods.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnlockCandidate.ts: Mutation hook to unlock a candidate profile and refresh related queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode, and role-based theme accents.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the app.
Admin dashboard with tabs for employers, jobseekers, credits, and unlock logs.
frontend/src/pages/EmployerCandidatesPag: Employer UI for browsing, filtering, and unlocking candidate profiles with credit checks.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page with hero section, feature cards, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/utils/actorDiagnostics.ts: Utilities to check actor objects for required backend methods and log diagnostics.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessages.ts: Normalizes backend actor errors into user-friendly messages and detects missing method errors.
frontend/src/utils/actorGuards.ts: Provides guard utilities to verify actor methods exist and safely invoke them, throwing custom errors when missing.
frontend/src/utils/formatInr.ts: Formats numbers as Indian Rupees with optional compact lakh format and parses INR strings back to numbers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending colors, animations, shadows, and radius with plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file describing scope, architecture notes, issues, and existing feature definitions for the Instant Jobs platform.
